title: Synthesis of 5’ end-labeled RNA
procedures: Synthesis of 5’-P RNA     In vitro Transcription (30 μl) T7 RNA polymerase 5x buffer           6 μl RNasin (40 U/μl)                                0.75 μl 100 mM DTT                                      3 μl 2.5 mM NTPs                                     6 μl DNA template (PCR fragment)          400 ng H2O (RNase free)                              to final volume (30 μl) T7 RNA polymerase (20 U/μl)           1.5 μl   Incubation 1 h 30 min at 37 °C.   Add to the reaction mix 2 μl of RQ1 DNase (1 U/μl).   Incubation 30 min at 37 °C (digestion of template DNA).   Put on ice to stop reaction.   Addition of 18 μl H2O to bring volume to 50 μl.   Purification of RNA by Spin-G25 column (load sample on gel bed, centrifuge 2 min at 735 x g (~3,000 rpm in a microfuge).     Dephosphorylation step (50 μl) Calf intestinal phosphatase (CIP 1 U/μl)                    2.5 μl CIP 10x buffer                                                            5 μl Purified RNA                                                              32.5 μl H2O                                                                            10 μl   Incubation 30 min at 37 °C.   Add 1 vol of Phenol/Chlorophorm (1:1), vortex 3 min.   Centrifuge 3 min at >10,000 x g to separate phases.   Precipitate upper aqueous phase by adding 1/10 vol. 3 M NaOAc (pH 4.7) + 3 vol. ETOH (96 %).   Centrifuge 10 min at >10,000 x g, take off EtOH and wash pellet once with 70% EtOH by inverting tube.   Air-dry pellet and take up the RNA in the desired volume of H2O.     Labelling reaction (20 μl) Dephosphorylated RNA                                            1 μg T4 Polynucleotide Kinase 10x buffer                         2 μl RNase inhibitor (40 U/μl)                                           0.25 μl γ32P ATP (10 μCi/μl)                                                  5 μl T4 Polynucleotide Kinase (10 U/μl)                           1.25 μl H2O                                                                            to 20 μl final volume   Incubate 2 h at 37 °C.   Precipitation as in step 2 and take up the pellet in desired volume.        Synthesis of 5’-PPP RNA T7 RNA polymerase 5x buffer                       6 μl RNasin (40 U/μl)                                            0.

75 μl DTT (100 mM)                                               3 μl ATP, UTP, CTP (2.5 mM)                               6 μl GTP (100 μM)                                                3.75 μl PCR                                                               400 ng γ32P GTP                                                       7.5 μl H2O                                                                to 30 μl final volume T7 RNA polymerase (20 U/μl)                       1.6 μl   Incubate 1 h, 30 min at 37 °C.   Add to the reaction mix 2 μl of RQ1 DNase (1 U/μl).   Incubation 30 min at 37 °C (digestion of DNA).   Precipitation with 1/10 vol 3 M NaOAc (pH 4.7) + 3 vol EtOH + 25 μg Glycogen.   Centrifuge 10 min at >10,000 x g, take off EtOH and wash pellet once with 70% EtOH by inverting tube.   Air-dry pellet and take up the RNA in the desired volume of H2O.
